issue.title: [C++] docker-compose build that runs "infer" tool on C++ codebase
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2221](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2221). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a follow-up to ARROW-1626, we ought to periodically look at the output of the "infer" tool to fix issues as they come up. This is probably too heavyweight to run in each CI build

cc `[~renesugar]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2221?focusedCommentId=16660844) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Based on ARROW-3599, I would say "infer" reports are not very interesting, but we may still find occasional insights in them.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2221?focusedCommentId=16761463) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
If we dockerize this and put it into in the UL buildbot then we can look at these whenever we want
